name: News Rush
description:
You got hired by a newspaper delivery company! Make sure you get those newspaper subscribers happy or get fired!

Use your mouse to press start and retry!

Best to be played in fullscreen!

Guiding Questions

1. We were inspired by the people who delivered newspapers door to door back then
2. We wanted to give an arcadey experience on how those who deliver newspapers or anything have to go through in a hdb flat
3. It was due to nostalgia that we went through with this idea and style of the game
